instruction: Extract a structured BPMN model from the following process description. Output valid JSON with exactly these top-level keys: participants, tasks, events, gateways, sequence_flows. Every node must reference a declared participant. Every pool must have a startEvent and endEvent. Sequence flows stay within pools; cross-pool communication uses message_flows.
input: The finance department receives an invoice. Simultaneously, a clerk verifies the invoice amount and checks that the purchase order matches. Once both checks are completed, the clerk books the invoice in the accounting system. The invoice is then paid and the finance department notifies the supplier that payment has been made. The supplier receives the payment notification and the process ends.
output: {"participants":[{"id":"finance","name":"Finance Department","type":"pool","lanes":[{"id":"lane_clerk","name":"Clerk"},{"id":"lane_finance_manager","name":"Finance Manager"}]},{"id":"supplier","name":"Supplier","type":"pool"}],"tasks":[{"id":"verify_amount","name":"Verify Invoice Amount","type":"task","participant":"finance","lane":"lane_clerk"},{"id":"check_purchase_order","name":"Check Purchase Order Match","type":"task","participant":"finance","lane":"lane_clerk"},{"id":"book_invoice","name":"Book Invoice in Accounting System","type":"task","participant":"finance","lane":"lane_clerk"},{"id":"pay_invoice","name":"Pay Invoice","type":"task","participant":"finance","lane":"lane_finance_manager"},{"id":"notify_supplier","name":"Notify Supplier of Payment","type":"task","participant":"finance","lane":"lane_finance_manager"},{"id":"receive_notification","name":"Receive Payment Notification","type":"task","participant":"supplier"}],"events":[{"id":"start_finance","name":"Invoice Received","type":"startEvent","participant":"finance","lane":"lane_clerk","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_finance","name":"Payment Sent","type":"endEvent","participant":"finance","lane":"lane_finance_manager","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"start_supplier","name":"Payment Notification Received","type":"startEvent","participant":"supplier","eventDefinition":"message"},{"id":"end_supplier","name":"Payment Confirmed","type":"endEvent","participant":"supplier","eventDefinition":"none"}],"gateways":[{"id":"gateway_parallel_split","name":"Start Parallel Checks","type":"parallelGateway","participant":"finance","lane":"lane_clerk","gatewayDirection":"diverging"},{"id":"gateway_parallel_join","name":"Both Checks Complete","type":"parallelGateway","participant":"finance","lane":"lane_clerk","gatewayDirection":"converging"}],"sequence_flows":[{"id":"sf1","from":"start_finance","to":"gateway_parallel_split"},{"id":"sf2","from":"gateway_parallel_split","to":"verify_amount"},{"id":"sf3","from":"gateway_parallel_split","to":"check_purchase_order"},{"id":"sf4","from":"verify_amount","to":"gateway_parallel_join"},{"id":"sf5","from":"check_purchase_order","to":"gateway_parallel_join"},{"id":"sf6","from":"gateway_parallel_join","to":"book_invoice"},{"id":"sf7","from":"book_invoice","to":"pay_invoice"},{"id":"sf8","from":"pay_invoice","to":"notify_supplier"},{"id":"sf9","from":"notify_supplier","to":"end_finance"},{"id":"sf10","from":"start_supplier","to":"receive_notification"},{"id":"sf11","from":"receive_notification","to":"end_supplier"}],"message_flows":[{"id":"mf1","from":"notify_supplier","to":"start_supplier","name":"Payment Notification"}],"data":[]}

instruction: Extract a structured BPMN model from the following process description. Output valid JSON with exactly these top-level keys: participants, tasks, events, gateways, sequence_flows. Every node must reference a declared participant. Every pool must have a startEvent and endEvent. Sequence flows stay within pools; cross-pool communication uses message_flows.
input: A customer places an order. The order is received by the warehouse. The warehouse checks whether the item is in stock. If the item is in stock, the warehouse ships the order and notifies the customer that the order has been shipped. The customer receives the shipment and the process ends. If the item is not in stock, the warehouse notifies the customer that the order is cancelled. The customer receives the cancellation and the process ends.
output: {"participants":[{"id":"customer","name":"Customer","type":"pool"},{"id":"warehouse","name":"Warehouse","type":"pool"}],"tasks":[{"id":"place_order","name":"Place Order","type":"task","participant":"customer"},{"id":"receive_shipment","name":"Receive Shipment","type":"task","participant":"customer"},{"id":"receive_order_cancellation","name":"Receive Order Cancellation","type":"task","participant":"customer"},{"id":"check_stock","name":"Check Stock","type":"task","participant":"warehouse"},{"id":"ship_order","name":"Ship Order","type":"task","participant":"warehouse"},{"id":"notify_cancellation","name":"Notify Customer of Cancellation","type":"task","participant":"warehouse"}],"events":[{"id":"start_customer","name":"Start","type":"startEvent","participant":"customer","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_customer_shipped","name":"Shipment Received","type":"endEvent","participant":"customer","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_customer_cancelled","name":"Order Cancelled","type":"endEvent","participant":"customer","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"start_warehouse","name":"Order Received","type":"startEvent","participant":"warehouse","eventDefinition":"message"},{"id":"end_warehouse_shipped","name":"Order Shipped","type":"endEvent","participant":"warehouse","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_warehouse_cancelled","name":"Cancellation Sent","type":"endEvent","participant":"warehouse","eventDefinition":"none"}],"gateways":[{"id":"gateway_stock","name":"Item in Stock?","type":"exclusiveGateway","participant":"warehouse","gatewayDirection":"diverging"}],"sequence_flows":[{"id":"sf1","from":"start_customer","to":"place_order"},{"id":"sf2","from":"receive_shipment","to":"end_customer_shipped"},{"id":"sf3","from":"receive_order_cancellation","to":"end_customer_cancelled"},{"id":"sf4","from":"start_warehouse","to":"check_stock"},{"id":"sf5","from":"check_stock","to":"gateway_stock"},{"id":"sf6","from":"gateway_stock","to":"ship_order","condition":"In Stock"},{"id":"sf7","from":"gateway_stock","to":"notify_cancellation","condition":"Out of Stock"},{"id":"sf8","from":"ship_order","to":"end_warehouse_shipped"},{"id":"sf9","from":"notify_cancellation","to":"end_warehouse_cancelled"}],"message_flows":[{"id":"mf1","from":"place_order","to":"start_warehouse","name":"Order"},{"id":"mf2","from":"ship_order","to":"receive_shipment","name":"Shipment Notification"},{"id":"mf3","from":"notify_cancellation","to":"receive_order_cancellation","name":"Cancellation Notice"}],"data":[]}

instruction: Extract a structured BPMN model from the following process description. Output valid JSON with exactly these top-level keys: participants, tasks, events, gateways, sequence_flows. Every node must reference a declared participant. Every pool must have a startEvent and endEvent. Sequence flows stay within pools; cross-pool communication uses message_flows.
input: When a new employee joins the company, HR starts the onboarding process. First, HR creates an account for the employee in the company system. Then, HR sends a welcome package to the employee. After that, HR organizes a mandatory orientation session. Finally, HR marks the onboarding as complete and the process ends.
output: {"participants":[{"id":"hr","name":"HR","type":"pool"}],"tasks":[{"id":"create_account","name":"Create Account in System","type":"task","participant":"hr"},{"id":"send_welcome_package","name":"Send Welcome Package","type":"task","participant":"hr"},{"id":"organize_orientation","name":"Organize Orientation Session","type":"task","participant":"hr"},{"id":"mark_complete","name":"Mark Onboarding as Complete","type":"task","participant":"hr"}],"events":[{"id":"start_onboarding","name":"New Employee Joins","type":"startEvent","participant":"hr","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_onboarding","name":"Onboarding Complete","type":"endEvent","participant":"hr","eventDefinition":"none"}],"gateways":[],"sequence_flows":[{"id":"sf1","from":"start_onboarding","to":"create_account"},{"id":"sf2","from":"create_account","to":"send_welcome_package"},{"id":"sf3","from":"send_welcome_package","to":"attend_orientation"},{"id":"sf4","from":"attend_orientation","to":"mark_complete"},{"id":"sf5","from":"mark_complete","to":"end_onboarding"}],"message_flows":[],"data":[]}

instruction: Extract a structured BPMN model from the following process description. Output valid JSON with exactly these top-level keys: participants, tasks, events, gateways, sequence_flows. Every node must reference a declared participant. Every pool must have a startEvent and endEvent. Sequence flows stay within pools; cross-pool communication uses message_flows.
input: The employee initiates an idea for a project. He needs to record the basic idea in a document and express its value for the company. He then needs to submit a request for approval to the manager of his team. The manager assesses the request for approval. If the project is approved, he will initiate a project plan. This involves simultaneously laying out a timeline, setting up a budget and stating the required resources. When this is done, the project is started. If otherwise, he rejects the plan, he will communicate the rejection to his employee.
output: {"participants":[{"id":"employee","name":"Employee","type":"pool"},{"id":"manager","name":"Manager","type":"pool"}],"tasks":[{"id":"record_idea","name":"Record Idea in Document","type":"task","participant":"employee"},{"id":"submit_request","name":"Submit Request for Approval","type":"task","participant":"employee"},{"id":"assess_request","name":"Assess Request for Approval","type":"task","participant":"manager"},{"id":"initiate_project_plan","name":"Initiate Project Plan","type":"task","participant":"manager"},{"id":"lay_out_timeline","name":"Lay Out Timeline","type":"task","participant":"manager"},{"id":"set_up_budget","name":"Set Up Budget","type":"task","participant":"manager"},{"id":"state_resources","name":"State Required Resources","type":"task","participant":"manager"},{"id":"communicate_rejection","name":"Communicate Rejection","type":"task","participant":"manager"}],"events":[{"id":"start_employee","name":"Start","type":"startEvent","participant":"employee","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_employee_approved","name":"Project Started","type":"endEvent","participant":"employee","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_employee_rejected","name":"Rejection Received","type":"endEvent","participant":"employee","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"start_manager","name":"Request Received","type":"startEvent","participant":"manager","eventDefinition":"message"},{"id":"end_manager_approved","name":"Project Started","type":"endEvent","participant":"manager","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_manager_rejected","name":"Rejection Communicated","type":"endEvent","participant":"manager","eventDefinition":"none"}],"gateways":[{"id":"gateway_approved_split","name":"Project Approved?","type":"exclusiveGateway","participant":"manager","gatewayDirection":"diverging"},{"id":"gateway_planning_split","name":"Plan in Parallel","type":"parallelGateway","participant":"manager","gatewayDirection":"diverging"},{"id":"gateway_planning_join","name":"Planning Complete","type":"parallelGateway","participant":"manager","gatewayDirection":"converging"}],"sequence_flows":[{"id":"sf1","from":"start_employee","to":"record_idea"},{"id":"sf2","from":"record_idea","to":"submit_request"},{"id":"sf3","from":"start_manager","to":"assess_request"},{"id":"sf4","from":"assess_request","to":"gateway_approved_split"},{"id":"sf5","from":"gateway_approved_split","to":"initiate_project_plan","condition":"Approved"},{"id":"sf6","from":"gateway_approved_split","to":"communicate_rejection","condition":"Rejected"},{"id":"sf7","from":"initiate_project_plan","to":"gateway_planning_split"},{"id":"sf8","from":"gateway_planning_split","to":"lay_out_timeline"},{"id":"sf9","from":"gateway_planning_split","to":"set_up_budget"},{"id":"sf10","from":"gateway_planning_split","to":"state_resources"},{"id":"sf11","from":"lay_out_timeline","to":"gateway_planning_join"},{"id":"sf12","from":"set_up_budget","to":"gateway_planning_join"},{"id":"sf13","from":"state_resources","to":"gateway_planning_join"},{"id":"sf14","from":"gateway_planning_join","to":"end_manager_approved"},{"id":"sf15","from":"communicate_rejection","to":"end_manager_rejected"}],"message_flows":[{"id":"mf1","from":"submit_request","to":"start_manager","name":"Approval Request"},{"id":"mf2","from":"gateway_planning_join","to":"end_employee_approved","name":"Project Start Notification"},{"id":"mf3","from":"communicate_rejection","to":"end_employee_rejected","name":"Rejection Notice"}],"data":[]}

instruction: Extract a structured BPMN model from the following process description. Output valid JSON with exactly these top-level keys: participants, tasks, events, gateways, sequence_flows. Every node must reference a declared participant. Every pool must have a startEvent and endEvent. Sequence flows stay within pools; cross-pool communication uses message_flows.
input: Platforms that link restaurants, delivery couriers, and hungry people – such as Uber Eats or Deliveroo – have grown substantially in recent years. When a new order comes in at the platform, the platform forwards the order to the restaurant in question and the kitchen staff at the restaurant starts to prepare the food. While this is happening, the platform also reaches out to their courier networks. If the distance between restaurant and customer is less than 5 kilometers, a bike courier starts to ride to the restaurant. Otherwise a scooter courier drives to the restaurant. When the courier arrives at the restaurant and the meal has been prepared, the courier takes the meal to the customer, after which the order process is completed.
output: {"participants":[{"id":"restaurant","name":"Restaurant","type":"pool"},{"id":"platform","name":"Platform","type":"pool"},{"id":"courier_network","name":"Courier Network","type":"pool","lanes":[{"id":"scooter_courier","name":"Scooter Courier"},{"id":"bike_courier","name":"Bike Courier"}]}],"tasks":[{"id":"prepare_food","name":"Prepare Food","type":"task","participant":"restaurant"},{"id":"forward_order","name":"Forward Order to Restaurant","type":"task","participant":"platform"},{"id":"reach_out_courier","name":"Reach Out to Courier Network","type":"task","participant":"platform"},{"id":"scooter_ride_to_restaurant","name":"Ride to Restaurant","type":"task","participant":"courier_network","lane":"scooter_courier"},{"id":"bike_ride_to_restaurant","name":"Ride to Restaurant","type":"task","participant":"courier_network","lane":"bike_courier"},{"id":"scooter_take_meal","name":"Take Meal to Customer","type":"task","participant":"courier_network","lane":"scooter_courier"},{"id":"bike_take_meal","name":"Take Meal to Customer","type":"task","participant":"courier_network","lane":"bike_courier"}],"events":[{"id":"order_received","name":"Order Received","type":"startEvent","participant":"platform","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"restaurant_order_received","name":"Order Received (Restaurant)","type":"startEvent","participant":"restaurant","eventDefinition":"message"},{"id":"courier_request_received","name":"Courier Request Received","type":"startEvent","participant":"courier_network","eventDefinition":"message"},{"id":"food_prepared","name":"Food is Prepared","type":"intermediateCatchEvent","participant":"restaurant","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"courier_arrived","name":"Courier has Arrived","type":"intermediateCatchEvent","participant":"restaurant","eventDefinition":"message"},{"id":"pickup_ready_received","name":"Pickup Ready","type":"intermediateCatchEvent","participant":"courier_network","eventDefinition":"message"},{"id":"delivery_confirmed","name":"Delivery Confirmed","type":"intermediateCatchEvent","participant":"platform","eventDefinition":"message"},{"id":"order_complete","name":"Order Complete","type":"endEvent","participant":"platform","eventDefinition":"none"}],"gateways":[{"id":"split_parallel","name":"","type":"parallelGateway","participant":"platform","gatewayDirection":"diverging"},{"id":"distance_split_1","name":"Distance < 5 km?","type":"exclusiveGateway","participant":"courier_network","gatewayDirection":"diverging"},{"id":"courier_join_1","name":"","type":"exclusiveGateway","participant":"courier_network","gatewayDirection":"converging"},{"id":"join_parallel","name":"","type":"parallelGateway","participant":"restaurant","gatewayDirection":"converging"},{"id":"distance_split_2","name":"Distance < 5 km?","type":"exclusiveGateway","participant":"courier_network","gatewayDirection":"diverging"},{"id":"courier_join_2","name":"","type":"exclusiveGateway","participant":"courier_network","gatewayDirection":"converging"}],"sequence_flows":[{"from":"order_received","to":"split_parallel"},{"from":"split_parallel","to":"forward_order"},{"from":"split_parallel","to":"reach_out_courier"},{"from":"restaurant_order_received","to":"prepare_food"},{"from":"prepare_food","to":"food_prepared"},{"from":"food_prepared","to":"join_parallel"},{"from":"courier_arrived","to":"join_parallel"},{"from":"courier_request_received","to":"distance_split_1"},{"from":"distance_split_1","to":"bike_ride_to_restaurant","condition":"< 5 km"},{"from":"distance_split_1","to":"scooter_ride_to_restaurant","condition":">= 5 km"},{"from":"bike_ride_to_restaurant","to":"courier_join_1"},{"from":"scooter_ride_to_restaurant","to":"courier_join_1"},{"from":"pickup_ready_received","to":"distance_split_2"},{"from":"distance_split_2","to":"bike_take_meal","condition":"< 5 km"},{"from":"distance_split_2","to":"scooter_take_meal","condition":">= 5 km"},{"from":"bike_take_meal","to":"courier_join_2"},{"from":"scooter_take_meal","to":"courier_join_2"},{"from":"delivery_confirmed","to":"order_complete"}],"message_flows":[{"from":"forward_order","to":"restaurant_order_received","name":"Order details"},{"from":"reach_out_courier","to":"courier_request_received","name":"Courier request"},{"from":"courier_join_1","to":"courier_arrived","name":"Courier arrived"},{"from":"join_parallel","to":"pickup_ready_received","name":"Pickup ready"},{"from":"courier_join_2","to":"delivery_confirmed","name":"Order delivered"}],"data":[]}

instruction: Extract a structured BPMN model from the following process description. Output valid JSON with exactly these top-level keys: participants, tasks, events, gateways, sequence_flows. Every node must reference a declared participant. Every pool must have a startEvent and endEvent. Sequence flows stay within pools; cross-pool communication uses message_flows.
input: Anouk and Jan operate a web shop in Rotterdam through which they sell self-knitted sweaters. The text below describes the process that occurs when a new order comes in through the shop. Sketch the process using BPMN with at least one intermediate event, as well as one pool with two lanes. When a new order comes in, Anouk picks out the relevant sweaters from the storage unit while Jan collects the packaging material from the basement. Afterwards, Anouk assembles the parcel. Once the parcel has been put together, Jan needs to take care of the delivery. Their web shop delivers within Rotterdam, within the Netherlands, and internationally. If the customer is in Rotterdam, Jan takes his bicycle and rides it to the customer’s address. Once there, he delivers the parcel directly. If the delivery needs to be sent to another city in the Netherlands, Jan rides his bicycle to the next PostNL shop. He then posts the parcel through PostNL. If, however, it is an international delivery, Jan rides his bicycle to the next DHL store instead. He then sends the parcel out as an international DHL delivery. While Jan is taking care of the delivery, Anouk emails the invoice to the customer. Once both have completed their tasks, the order has been completed.
output: {"participants":[{"id":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","name":"Rotterdam Sweater Shop","type":"pool","lanes":[{"id":"jan","name":"Jan"},{"id":"anouk","name":"Anouk"}]}],"tasks":[{"id":"pick_out_sweaters","name":"Pick out sweaters","type":"task","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"anouk"},{"id":"collect_packaging_material","name":"Collect package material","type":"task","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"jan"},{"id":"assemble_package","name":"Assemble package","type":"task","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"anouk"},{"id":"email_invoice","name":"Email invoice","type":"task","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"anouk"},{"id":"ride_bike_to_customer","name":"Ride bike to customer","type":"task","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"jan"},{"id":"deliver_package","name":"Deliver package","type":"task","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"jan"},{"id":"ride_bike_to_postnl_store","name":"Ride bike to PostNL store","type":"task","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"jan"},{"id":"send_package_via_postnl","name":"Send package via PostNL","type":"task","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"jan"},{"id":"ride_bike_to_dhl_store","name":"Ride bike to DHL store","type":"task","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"jan"},{"id":"send_package_via_dhl","name":"Send package via DHL","type":"task","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"jan"}],"events":[{"id":"order_received","name":"Order received","type":"startEvent","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"anouk","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"package_complete","name":"Package complete","type":"intermediateCatchEvent","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"jan","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"order_completed","name":"Order completed","type":"endEvent","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","lane":"anouk","eventDefinition":"none"}],"gateways":[{"id":"pg_split_prepare","name":"","type":"parallelGateway","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","gatewayDirection":"diverging"},{"id":"pg_join_prepare","name":"","type":"parallelGateway","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","gatewayDirection":"converging"},{"id":"pg_split_invoice_delivery","name":"","type":"parallelGateway","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","gatewayDirection":"diverging"},{"id":"xg_deliver_to","name":"Deliver to:","type":"exclusiveGateway","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","gatewayDirection":"diverging"},{"id":"xg_delivery_done_merge","name":"","type":"exclusiveGateway","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","gatewayDirection":"converging"},{"id":"pg_join_finish","name":"","type":"parallelGateway","participant":"rotterdam_sweater_shop","gatewayDirection":"converging"}],"sequence_flows":[{"from":"order_received","to":"pg_split_prepare"},{"from":"pg_split_prepare","to":"pick_out_sweaters"},{"from":"pg_split_prepare","to":"collect_packaging_material"},{"from":"pick_out_sweaters","to":"pg_join_prepare"},{"from":"collect_packaging_material","to":"pg_join_prepare"},{"from":"pg_join_prepare","to":"assemble_package"},{"from":"assemble_package","to":"package_complete"},{"from":"package_complete","to":"pg_split_invoice_delivery"},{"from":"pg_split_invoice_delivery","to":"email_invoice"},{"from":"pg_split_invoice_delivery","to":"xg_deliver_to"},{"from":"xg_deliver_to","to":"ride_bike_to_customer","condition":"Rotterdam"},{"from":"ride_bike_to_customer","to":"deliver_package"},{"from":"deliver_package","to":"xg_delivery_done_merge"},{"from":"xg_deliver_to","to":"ride_bike_to_postnl_store","condition":"NL"},{"from":"ride_bike_to_postnl_store","to":"send_package_via_postnl"},{"from":"send_package_via_postnl","to":"xg_delivery_done_merge"},{"from":"xg_deliver_to","to":"ride_bike_to_dhl_store","condition":"International"},{"from":"ride_bike_to_dhl_store","to":"send_package_via_dhl"},{"from":"send_package_via_dhl","to":"xg_delivery_done_merge"},{"from":"email_invoice","to":"pg_join_finish"},{"from":"xg_delivery_done_merge","to":"pg_join_finish"},{"from":"pg_join_finish","to":"order_completed"}],"message_flows":[],"data":[]}

instruction: Extract a structured BPMN model from the following process description. Output valid JSON with exactly these top-level keys: participants, tasks, events, gateways, sequence_flows. Every node must reference a declared participant. Every pool must have a startEvent and endEvent. Sequence flows stay within pools; cross-pool communication uses message_flows.
input: A bank employee starts a loan application review. First, the employee checks the applicant's credit score. Based on the result, a decision is made. If the credit score is sufficient, the loan is approved and the applicant is notified of the approval. If the credit score is insufficient, the loan is rejected and the applicant is notified of the rejection. In both cases the process ends.
output: {"participants":[{"id":"bank","name":"Bank","type":"pool"}],"tasks":[{"id":"check_credit_score","name":"Check Credit Score","type":"task","participant":"bank"},{"id":"notify_approval","name":"Notify Applicant of Approval","type":"task","participant":"bank"},{"id":"notify_rejection","name":"Notify Applicant of Rejection","type":"task","participant":"bank"}],"events":[{"id":"start_review","name":"Loan Application Received","type":"startEvent","participant":"bank","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_approved","name":"Loan Approved","type":"endEvent","participant":"bank","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_rejected","name":"Loan Rejected","type":"endEvent","participant":"bank","eventDefinition":"none"}],"gateways":[{"id":"gateway_credit","name":"Credit Score Sufficient?","type":"exclusiveGateway","participant":"bank","gatewayDirection":"diverging"}],"sequence_flows":[{"id":"sf1","from":"start_review","to":"check_credit_score"},{"id":"sf2","from":"check_credit_score","to":"gateway_credit"},{"id":"sf3","from":"gateway_credit","to":"notify_approval","condition":"Sufficient"},{"id":"sf4","from":"gateway_credit","to":"notify_rejection","condition":"Insufficient"},{"id":"sf5","from":"notify_approval","to":"end_approved"},{"id":"sf6","from":"notify_rejection","to":"end_rejected"}],"message_flows":[],"data":[]}

instruction: Extract a structured BPMN model from the following process description. Output valid JSON with exactly these top-level keys: participants, tasks, events, gateways, sequence_flows. Every node must reference a declared participant. Every pool must have a startEvent and endEvent. Sequence flows stay within pools; cross-pool communication uses message_flows.
input: A patient schedules an appointment and visits the doctor. The doctor examines the patient and decides whether lab tests are needed. If lab tests are needed, the doctor sends a test request to the lab. The lab processes the test request, performs the tests and sends the results back to the doctor. The doctor reviews the results and prescribes a treatment to the patient. The patient receives the treatment prescription and the process ends. If no lab tests are needed, the doctor directly prescribes a treatment to the patient. The patient receives the prescription and the process ends.
output: {"participants":[{"id":"patient","name":"Patient","type":"pool"},{"id":"doctor","name":"Doctor","type":"pool"},{"id":"lab","name":"Lab","type":"pool"}],"tasks":[{"id":"schedule_appointment","name":"Schedule Appointment","type":"task","participant":"patient"},{"id":"visit_doctor","name":"Visit Doctor","type":"task","participant":"patient"},{"id":"receive_prescription","name":"Receive Treatment Prescription","type":"task","participant":"patient"},{"id":"examine_patient","name":"Examine Patient","type":"task","participant":"doctor"},{"id":"review_results","name":"Review Lab Results","type":"task","participant":"doctor"},{"id":"prescribe_treatment","name":"Prescribe Treatment","type":"task","participant":"doctor"},{"id":"process_request","name":"Process Test Request","type":"task","participant":"lab"},{"id":"perform_tests","name":"Perform Tests","type":"task","participant":"lab"}],"events":[{"id":"start_patient","name":"Start","type":"startEvent","participant":"patient","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"end_patient","name":"Prescription Received","type":"endEvent","participant":"patient","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"start_doctor","name":"Patient Arrives","type":"startEvent","participant":"doctor","eventDefinition":"message"},{"id":"end_doctor","name":"Treatment Prescribed","type":"endEvent","participant":"doctor","eventDefinition":"none"},{"id":"start_lab","name":"Test Request Received","type":"startEvent","participant":"lab","eventDefinition":"message"},{"id":"end_lab","name":"Results
